description:
A shooter game for those who love a lot of excitement and challenge, are your instincts and reflexes good enough to become the champion of chaos, challenge yourself in 4 game modes.

Standar Mode
Directly to Chaos
Time Attack
Slow Motion

Developer by BeniGames
Publisher Gramik Games
name: SHAPE NEON CHAOS
intro: Will you be able to overcome all obstacles? Challenges and overcoming await you in this game, try to win in all 4 modes and be the CHAMPION OF CAOS!
